subject: College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. will ban coaches from scouting future opponents at most live games in all sports. The legislation fell short of being overridden last week by the full membership.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. will ban coaches from scouting future opponents at most live games in all sports. The legislation fell short of being overridden last week by the full membership.
